lessons.title: Fun Stance: Zenkutsu-dachi
lessons.text: Zenkutsu-dachi is a cool front stance! Put one leg in front and one leg back, like a superhero ready to jump!

lessons.title: Power Punch: Oi-zuki
lessons.text: Oi-zuki is a strong punch! Stand in Zenkutsu-dachi and punch straight ahead, like hitting a target!

quizzes.question: What stance is this?
quizzes.explanation: This is Zenkutsu-dachi, a front stance with one leg forward!

quizzes.question: What do you do with your fist in Oi-zuki?
quizzes.explanation: In Oi-zuki, you punch straight ahead with power!

quizzes.question: Which stance has both feet together?
quizzes.explanation: Heiko-dachi is the stance where your feet are together.

quizzes.question: Which belt comes after White Belt?
quizzes.explanation: The next belt after White is Yellow Belt.

quizzes.question: What is the first move in Taikyoku Shodan?
quizzes.explanation: The first move is a downward block in Zenkutsu-dachi.

quizzes.question: How many katas are there in Shotokan Karate?
quizzes.explanation: There are 26 katas in Shotokan Karate.

quizzes.question: Which stance is used for Oi-zuki?
What is the purpose of a kata?
quizzes.explanation: Katas are used to practice and perfect techniques.

lessons.title: Super Kick: Mae-geri
lessons.text: Mae-geri is a front kick! Lift your knee up high and kick straight with the ball of your foot, like kicking a ball!

quizzes.question: Which kick is shown here?
quizzes.explanation: This is Mae-geri, a super front kick!

lessons.title: Ninja Block: Shuto-uke
lessons.text: Shuto-uke is a ninja block with your hand! Use the side of your hand to stop an attack, like a shield!

quizzes.question: What block is this?
quizzes.explanation: This is Shuto-uke, a ninja block with the side of your hand!
